member.name: T:Avanteam.Studio.Modules.Invoice.LignesDetails.EnumDescConverter
member.summary: EnumConverter supporting System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Studio.Modules.Invoice.LignesDetails.EnumDescConverter.GetEnumDescription(System.Enum)
member.summary: Gets Enum Value's Description Attribute.
member.param: The value you want the description attribute for.
member.returns: The description, if any, else it's .ToString().

member.name: M:Avanteam.Studio.Modules.Invoice.LignesDetails.EnumDescConverter.GetEnumDescription(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the description for certaing named value in an Enumeration.
member.param: The name of the Enumeration value.
member.returns: The description, if any, else the passed name.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Studio.Modules.Invoice.LignesDetails.EnumDescConverter.GetEnumValue(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of an Enum, based on it's Description Attribute or named value.
member.param: The description or name of the element.
member.returns: The value, or the passed in description, if it was not found.
